hanzi-su-wiki:
編

Значения

Вязать, плести, составлять (книгу)

Мнемоника

Вязать, плести, т.е. делать нитки 糸 плоскими 扁, превращать их в ткань. Сплетать из частей книгу, переплёт.

Варианты

编
purpleculture_pinyin:
biān
to weave; to plait; to organize; to group; to arrange; to edit; to compile; to write; to compose; to fabricate
плести; плести; организовывать; группировать; устроить; редактировать; Скомпилировать; написать; сочинять; изготовить
rtega_mnemonic:
編編RS
编编		knit, weave, arrange, compile
  • tablet 扁 with threads 糸 on top: ready to weave (compiling threads)
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 编)
Pictophonetic: 扁 indicates the sound; 糹 (thread) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
編輯 [ biān jí ]: to edit; to compile; editor; compiler
編製 [ biān zhì ]: to weave; to plait; to compile; to put together (a lesson plan, budget etc)
編制 [ biān zhì ]: to weave; to plait; to braid; to work out; to draw up; to prepare; to compile; authorized strength; establishment
編寫 [ biān xiě ]: to compile
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 糹 [ sī ] silk; thread
    • 扁 [ biǎn ] flat; board, sign, tablet
heisig_chinese_memo: I took the compileation of covers of all my Spiderman comics that I had saved in a scrapbook and glued them flat on my door.
heisig_constituent: compilation, thread, spiderman, fishfinger, door, one, ceiling, flag, scrapbook, glass canopy, hood, flowers
Keyword_KANJIDIC: compilation, knit, plait, braid, twist, editing, completed poem, part of a book
Keyword_KANJIDIC_ru: сборник, вязать, коса, тесьма, поворот, редактирование, завершено стихотворение, часть книги
koohiiStory1: Raulir has a good idea. I prefer to think of the manga compilations as the individual comics (serials from the anthologies) bound together with a coarse thread down the spine, produced quickly and put on the market. Good way to recycle those pulpy manga, and since when has the consumer not gotten screwed in Japan? ;-).
koohiiStory2: A Japanese comic book is a compilation of the individual chapters (which have already appeared in weekly comic magazines) with a thread (story arc) going through it.
jp_example_words:
長編(ちょうへん): long (e.g. novel film)
編(へん): compilation, editing, completed poem, book, part of book
編物(あみもの): knitting, web
編む(あむ): to knit, to braid, compile (anthology, dictionary, etc.), edit
短編(たんぺん): short (e.g. story, film)
編集(へんしゅう): editing, compilation, editorial (e.g. committee)
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: Bring thread to the library to knit. Libraries are quiet and generally pretty empty nowadays, so it's the perfect place to relax and do some knitting. Of course, if you find thread lying around in a library you know what to do now.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Picture yourself sitting on a rocking chair in the library knitting away. It's quiet and peaceful and the light is warming you just right. Ahh, bliss!
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: You need to come to the library to knit because if you try to do it at home all your hens (へん) will try to eat the thread. Hens love eating things that look like worms, like hay, string, and thread. So it's important to get far away from them before you start to knit.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Imagine the granny or grampy you are (and must be to have hens and want to knit in peace in a library). You're tired of these hens eating your thread while you try to knit sweaters for all your grandbabies so you come to the library.
Ru_Meaning: compilation, knit, plait, braid, twist, editing, completed poem, part of a book
Ru_Notes: В значениях "произведение, книга, часть" реже: 篇 (ヘン произведение, книга, часть). Значения 篇 влились в этот кандзи. Исходно 編 значило связку дощечек с текстом (сборник, цикл произведений), 篇 отдельную дощечку (одно произведение).
Ru_Radicals: 一 (один), ｜, 冂 (перевёрнутая коробка), 小 (маленький), 尸 (труп), 幺 (короткая нить), 戸 (дверь), 冊 (том), 糸 (нить)
Ru_trainchinese:
biān: (глаг) плести; редактировать, составлять; писать, сочинять (напр., стихи)
biān: (глаг) плести, заплетать; формировать; фабриковать
biān: (графема) книга, том (часто используется в названиях книг); часть книги (по размеру больше, чем глава); уполномоченный персонал, размер учреждения
Kanshudo_mnemonic: use flat (扁) thread (糸) for knitting
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Spiderman secrectly compiles a collection of his own comics ordered by his favorite book covers
humanum_full_description_en:
Oracle from "糸" to " Book ", it means that the book will be combined with silk rope. (Guo Moruo, Huang Tianshu) Xiaozhuan's sound from "糸", " bian ". The original meaning is to arrange bamboo slips. "Shuowen": "Edit, second 𥳑 also. From 糸, flat sound." Paragraph note: "Arranged by the second brother of the silk bamboo 𥳑 called compilation." There is only one case of Oracle bone inscriptions, and its usage is to be tested.

" Edit " means edit link. Such as "Han Shu. "Jia Zoumei Road Biography": "Wen Shu took Zezhongpu, cut it as a bill, weave it into a book." It also refers to the rope that weaves the bamboo slips, that is, weave rope. Such as "Historical Records. "Confucius Family": "Confucius was late for "The Yi", the preface "彖", "Xi", "Xiang", "Shugua", "Classical Chinese". Reading "Yi", Wei compiled three excellent." "Wei edited three "Absolute" means that the braided rope is broken three times.

The extension of " Edit " means that they are arranged sequentially. Such as "Spring and Autumn Valley Liang Chuan. "The First Year of Huan AD": "The Chronicles of "Spring and Autumn", four seasons and then the year." "Warring States. "Chu Ceyi": "When a minister enters the seat, he will accompany him."

" Edit " is used as a quantifier to indicate the calculation unit of the book. Such as "Historical Records. "Liu Hou Family": "Published a book, saying: "Reading this is the king's teacher..."" It can also mean the entire book, or a part of the book, such as the first and second editions. For example, Lu Zhaolin's "Preface to the Miscellaneous Poems of Yuefu" in the Tang Dynasty: "Interviewing the legacy is compiled in the four seas." Han Yu, "Jin Xue Jie": "Mr.

" Knitting " means knitting and weaving. Such as "Xunzi. "Encourage Learning": "There is a bird yan in the south, the name is Mongolian dove, which uses feathers as a nest, and weave it for hair, tie the reed vetch, the wind breaks, the egg breaks and the child dies." Chapter Nine. "Sorrowful Return to the Wind": "Thinking of sorrow, thinking of sorrow, thinking of sorrow."

" Braised " also means braided hair, later called " braid ". "Release name. Explanation of Jewelry: "Edit, edit and issue it." Such as "Historical Records. The Biographies of Southwestern Yi: "From the outside to the west, to the east of the same teacher, and to the north of Luyu, they are named Shau and Kunming. They are all compiled and issued, and they migrate with the animals. There is no permanent place or no ruler. The place can be thousands of miles." Heng. Zhi Rui": "If it should be, it is almost and there is a solution to braid hair, cut the left gusset, attack the crown and belt, and then Meng Huayan."

" Edit " also means composing and editing. Such as "Han Feizi. "Difficulty Three": "Law, the compilation of the books, set in the government, and the people who distribute it." Liu Zongyuan of the Tang Dynasty "Refute the Fuyu Discussion": "And please compile it in the Ling, it will be the national code forever."

After " editing ", it also expressed fabrication. For example, Chapter 39 of "Dream of Red Mansions": "Although Grandma Liu is a village savage, she was born with some insights. Moreover, she was old and experienced in the world. The first mother Jia was happy. The second time I saw these brothers and sisters I love to listen, so I don’t have to say something and make up some words to talk about it." "Jing Hua Yuan" Chapter 93: "I was about to engrave the wine order, he made up this joke, really mean."
humanum_short_description_en: Oracle from "糸" from " book ", it means that the book will be combined with silk rope. (Guo Moruo, Huang Tianshu) Xiaozhuan's sound from "糸", " bian ". The original meaning is to arrange bamboo slips.
humanum_full_description:
甲骨文從「糸」從「冊」，會以絲繩編連簡冊之意。（郭沫若、黃天樹）小篆從「糸」，「扁」聲。本義是編排竹簡。《說文》：「編，次𥳑也。从糸，扁聲。」段注：「以絲次弟竹𥳑而排列之曰編。」甲骨文只見一例，用法待考。

　　「編」表示編聯。如《漢書．賈鄒枚路傳》：「溫舒取澤中蒲，截以為牒，編用寫書。」又指編連竹簡的繩子，即編繩。如《史記．孔子世家》：「孔子晚而喜《易》，序《彖》、《繫》、《象》、《說卦》、《文言》。讀《易》，韋編三絕。」「韋編三絕」意謂編繩斷了三次。

　　「編」引申表示順次排列。如《春秋穀梁傳．桓公元年》：「《春秋》編年，四時具而後為年。」《戰國策．楚策一》：「臣入則編席，出則陪乘。」

　　「編」用作量詞，表示書的計算單位。如《史記．留侯世家》：「出一編書，曰：『讀此則為王者師矣……』」又可以表示整本書，或者書的一部份，如上編、下編。如唐代盧照鄰〈樂府雜詩序〉：「訪遺編於四海。」韓愈〈進學解〉：「先生口不絕吟於六藝之文，手不停披於百家之編。」

　　「編」表示編結、編織。如《荀子．勸學》：「南方有鳥焉，名曰蒙鳩，以羽為巢，而編之以髮，繫之葦苕，風至苕折，卵破子死。」《楚辭．九章．悲回風》：「糺思心以為纕兮，編愁苦以為膺。」

　　「編」也表示編髮，後作「辮」。《釋名．釋首飾》：「編，編髮為之也。」如《史記．西南夷列傳》：「其外西自同師以東，北至楪榆，名為嶲、昆明，皆編髮，隨畜遷徙，毋常處，毋君長，地方可數千里。」《論衡．指瑞》：「是若應，殆且有解編髮、削左衽、襲冠帶而蒙化焉。」

　　「編」也表示編寫、編輯。如《韓非子．難三》：「法者，編著之圖籍，設之於官府，而布之於百姓者也。」唐代柳宗元〈駁復讎議〉：「且請編之於令，為永為國典。」

　　「編」後還表示捏造。如《紅樓夢》第39回：「那劉姥姥雖是個村野人，卻生來的有些見識，況且年紀老了，世情上經歷過的，見頭一個賈母高興，第二見這些哥兒姐兒們都愛聽，便沒了說的也編出些話來講。」《鏡花緣》第93回：「我剛要刻酒令，他就編出這個笑話，真是刻薄鬼。」
humanum_short_description: 甲骨文從「糸」從「冊」，會以絲繩編連簡冊之意。（郭沫若、黃天樹）小篆從「糸」，「扁」聲。本義是編排竹簡。

English Definition: to weave; to plait; to organize; to group; to arrange; to edit; to compile; to write; to compose; to fabricate

Pictophonetic: 扁 indicates the sound; 糹 (thread) conveys the meaning.

編制 [ biān zhì ]: to weave; to plait; to braid; to work out; to draw up; to prepare; to compile; authorized strength; establishment
編寫 [ biān xiě ]: to compile

①用細條或帶形的東西交叉組織起來：編結。編織。編扎。
②按一定的原則、規則或次序來組織或排列：編排。編目(編制目錄或指已編成的目錄)。編次。編年。編訂。編配。編碼。
③把材料加以適當的組織排列而成爲書籍、報刊、廣播電視節目等：編寫。編譯。編審。編修。編纂。編印。
④創作：編劇。編導。
⑤捏造：編瞎話。
⑥成本的書按內容劃分的部分：正編。續編。簡編。

甲骨文從「 糸 」從「 冊 」，會以絲繩編連簡冊之意。（郭沫若、黃天樹）小篆從「 糸 」，「 扁 」聲。本義是編排竹簡。《說文》：「編，次𥳑也。从糸，扁聲。」段注：「以絲次弟竹𥳑而排列之曰編。」甲骨文只見一例，用法待考。 「 編 」表示編聯。如《漢書．賈鄒枚路傳》：「溫舒取澤中蒲，截以為牒，編用寫書。」又指編連竹簡的繩子，即編繩。如《史記．孔子世家》：「孔子晚而喜《易》，序《彖》、《繫》、《象》、《說卦》、《文言》。讀《易》，韋編三絕。」「韋編三絕」意謂編繩斷了三次。 「 編 」引申表示順次排列。如《春秋穀梁傳．桓公元年》：「《春秋》編年，四時具而後為年。」《戰國策．楚策一》：「臣入則編席，出則陪乘。」 「 編 」用作量詞，表示書的計算單位。如《史記．留侯世家》：「出一編書，曰：『讀此則為王者師矣……』」又可以表示整本書，或者書的一部份，如上編、下編。如唐代盧照鄰〈樂府雜詩序〉：「訪遺編於四海。」韓愈〈進學解〉：「先生口不絕吟於六藝之文，手不停披於百家之編。」 「 編 」表示編結、編織。如《荀子．勸學》：「南方有鳥焉，名曰蒙鳩，以羽為巢，而編之以髮，繫之葦苕，風至苕折，卵破子死。」《楚辭．九章．悲回風》：「糺思心以為纕兮，編愁苦以為膺。」 「 編 」也表示編髮，後作「 辮 」。《釋名．釋首飾》：「編，編髮為之也。」如《史記．西南夷列傳》：「其外西自同師以東，北至楪榆，名為嶲、昆明，皆編髮，隨畜遷徙，毋常處，毋君長，地方可數千里。」《論衡．指瑞》：「是若應，殆且有解編髮、削左衽、襲冠帶而蒙化焉。」 「 編 」也表示編寫、編輯。如《韓非子．難三》：「法者，編著之圖籍，設之於官府，而布之於百姓者也。」唐代柳宗元〈駁復讎議〉：「且請編之於令，為永為國典。」 「 編 」後還表示捏造。如《紅樓夢》第39回：「那劉姥姥雖是個村野人，卻生來的有些見識，況且年紀老了，世情上經歷過的，見頭一個賈母高興，第二見這些哥兒姐兒們都愛聽，便沒了說的也編出些話來講。」《鏡花緣》第93回：「我剛要刻酒令，他就編出這個笑話，真是刻薄鬼。」

編字的基本解释

編
biān
见“编”。

編字的汉语字典释义

[①]［biān］
［《廣韻》卑連切，平仙，幫。］
［《廣韻》布玄切，平先，幫。］
［《廣韻》方典切，上銑，幫。］
“编1”的繁体字。
(1)穿联竹简的皮条或绳子。
(2)书籍。
(3)书的计数单位。指一部书或书的一部分。
(4)顺次排列。
(5)指把分散的事物按照一定的条理组织起来。参见“編年”、“編組”。
(6)连接。参见“編町”。
(7)收列；列入。
(8)编辑；创作。
(9)编织。
(10)编造；捏造。
(11)古县名。汉属南郡，在今湖北省南漳县境。见《汉书·地理志上》、北魏郦道元《水经注·漳水》。
(12)姓。汉代有编盲意。见《後汉书·方术传下·解奴辜》。
[②]［biàn］
［《集韻》婢典切，上銑，並。］
“编2”的繁体字。通“辮1”。

【未集中】【糸字部】　編； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页931第08
【廣韻】布懸切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?眠切，?音邊。【說文】次?也。【史記·孔子世家】讀易，韋編三絕。【前漢·儒林傳註】編，所以聯次?也。　又首服也。【周禮·天官】追師掌王后之首服，爲副編次，追衡筓。【註】編，編列髮爲之，若今之假紒矣。　又編鐘。【周禮·春官·磬師】擊編鐘。【註】編，讀爲編書之編。　又結也。【楚辭·九章】編愁苦以爲膺。　又【字林】以繩次物曰編。又【玉篇】編，織也，連也。　又【廣韻】方典切【集韻】【韻會】補典切，?音匾。編，綃也。又絞也。　又【集韻】婢典切【正韻】婢免切，?音辮。【史記·西南夷傳】皆編髮，隨畜遷徙。【前漢·終軍傳】殆將有解編髮，削左袵而蒙化者。【註】編，讀辮。　又【集韻】蒲眠切，音蹁。緶，或作編。交枲也。　【博雅】編，絛也。

(1) Wear leather strips or ropes with combined bamboo slips.
(2) Books.
(3) The counting unit of the book. Refers to a book or part of a book.
(4) Arrange sequentially.
(5) Refers to the organization of scattered things in a certain order. See "chronology", "grouping".
(6) Connection. See "editing".
(7) Include; Include.
(8) Editing; creation.
(9) Weaving.
(10) Fabricate; fabricate.
(11) The name of the ancient county. Han belonged to Nanjun, in the border of Nanzhang County, Hubei Province. See "Han Shu·Geography", Northern Wei Dynasty Li Daoyuan "Shui Jing Zhu·Zhangshui".
(12) Last name. In the Han Dynasty, there was editorial blindness. See "The Book of the Later Han Dynasty·The Prescription of Alchemy·Jie Nu Gu".

Edit
Name meaning
Nothing.
biān
вм. 编
Radicals: 糸, 扁  (thread, library)
Meaning Mnemonic
Bring thread to the library to knit. Libraries are quiet and generally pretty empty nowadays, so it's the perfect place to relax and do some knitting. Of course, if you find thread lying around in a library you know what to do now.
Picture yourself sitting on a rocking chair in the library knitting away. It's quiet and peaceful and the light is warming you just right. Ahh, bliss!
Reading Mnemonic
You need to come to the library to knit because if you try to do it at home all your hens (へん) will try to eat the thread. Hens love eating things that look like worms, like hay, string, and thread. So it's important to get far away from them before you start to knit.
Imagine the granny or grampy you are (and must be to have hens and want to knit in peace in a library). You're tired of these hens eating your thread while you try to knit sweaters for all your grandbabies so you come to the library.

Examples: 編む (あ.む)
一 (один), ｜, 冂 (перевёрнутая коробка), 小 (маленький), 尸 (труп), 幺 (короткая нить), 戸 (дверь), 冊 (том), 糸 (нить)
В значениях "произведение, книга, часть" реже: 篇 (ヘン произведение, книга, часть). Значения 篇 влились в этот кандзи. Исходно 編 значило связку дощечек с текстом (сборник, цикл произведений), 篇 отдельную дощечку (одно произведение).
